headline: Constellation Energy Corporation (CEG) Falls More Steeply Than Broader Market: What Investors Need to Know
summary: In the closing of the recent trading day, Constellation Energy Corporation (CEG) stood at $307.92, denoting a -4.6% move from the preceding trading day.

headline: Dow Climbs 500 Points After Senate Passes Tax Bill
summary: The stock market’s rally broadened on Tuesday after the Senate passed President Donald Trump’s signature tax bill. The Dow rose 500 points, or 1.1%. The S&P 500 was down less than 0.1%. The Nasdaq Composite, dragged down by struggles by Tesla and other high-flying AI stocks after a blockbuster second quarter, was down 0.

headline: Why the Dow Is Crushing the S&P 500 and Nasdaq
summary: The Dow was running away from the other major indexes on Tuesday, but it’s still down from its December high.  The blue-chip index was up 400 points, or 0.9%.  The S&P 500 was down 0.3%, while the Nasdaq Composite was down 1%.

headline: Surging Clean Energy Demand Sparks Renewed Focus on Nuclear Stocks
summary: For investors aiming to build a nuclear-focused portfolio, companies like Entergy, Dominion Energy, and Constellation Energy present compelling opportunities.

headline: 2025 H1 Portfolio Review: More Ways To Win
summary: My portfolio outperformed the S&P 500 as I deployed a larger than normal amount of cash into new trades. I remain cautiously bullish for H2 2025, expecting stronger returns ahead.
